verse: गोपालांगणकर्दमे विहरसे विप्राध्वरे लज्जसे बूषे गोसुतहुंकृतैः स्तुतिपदैर्मौनं विधत्से सताम् । दास्यं गोकुलकामिनीषु कुरुषे स्वाम्यं न दत्तात्मसु जाने कृष्ण त्वदीय पादयुगलं प्रेमैकलभ्यं परम् ॥

words_meaning.गोपालांगणकर्दमे: playing in the courtyard of Gopala
words_meaning.गोसुतहुंकृतैः: by the praise of the cowherd boys
words_meaning.स्तुतिपदैर्मौनं: silence from the words of praise
words_meaning.दत्तात्मसु: to those who surrender their souls

overall_meaning: O Krishna, I know that you play in the courtyard of Gopala, sport in the assembly of Brahmins, are bashful, adorned with the praise of the cowherd boys, maintain silence in response to the words of praise for the pious, perform service among the damsels of Gokula, yet do not reveal your lordship to those who surrender their souls. I seek your lotus feet, attainable only by supreme love.
